subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets will wake up today in a place where pitchers bat and No. 8 hitters do not bat .280. No more Yankees or Red Sox, bleacher creatures or Green Monsters.
snippet: The Mets will wake up today in a place where pitchers bat and No. 8 hitters do not bat .280. No more Yankees or Red Sox, bleacher creatures or Green Monsters.
